translations: 预测（predict 的 ing 形式）；预报；预言

sentences.sentence: The latest opinion polls are predicting a very close contest.
sentences.translation: 最新的民意测验预言将是一场势均力敌的竞赛。

sentences.sentence: There is no way at present of predicting which individuals will develop the disease.
sentences.translation: 目前还没有办法预言哪些人会患这种病。

sentences.sentence: Predicting the future is always risky.
sentences.translation: 预测未来总是有风险的。
